title: Ep. 242: Deep Thoughts on Emily in Paris & The Week’s Beauty News
itunes:title: Ep. 242: Deep Thoughts on Emily in Paris & The Week’s Beauty News
itunes:subtitle: Bonjour, Fat Mascara Family! Indulge us this week, as we take a deep dive into Netflix’s Emily in Paris. The fashion, the hair, the characters, and the show’s depictions of the beauty industry, perfumers, and influencer culture—we’re discussing it all....
description:
Bonjour, Fat Mascara Family! Indulge us this week, as we take a deep dive into Netflix’s Emily in Paris. The fashion, the hair, the characters, and the show’s depictions of the beauty industry, perfumers, and influencer culture—we’re discussing it all. Before that, we’ll bring you up to speed on the beauty news, including an increase in body-care sales, SheaMoisture’s It Comes Naturally campaign, Khloé Kardashian’s investment in collagen brand Dose & Co, and beauty companies that are becoming more inclusive of people with visible and invisible disabilities. -- Want more of our beauty podcast? Episode Recaps & Notes: fatmascara.com/blog; Our Private Facebook Group: Fat Mascara / Raising a Wand; Instagram: @fatmascara, @jessicamatlin, @jenn_edit; Twitter: @fatmascara; Email: info@fatmascara.com; To Leave a Voicemail & Be Featured on a Future Episode: 646-481-8182.

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/fatmascara.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
